about_the_game:
“Is it different or not?” is for the true detectives of spotting. Your task is to scrutinize every corner of a schoolroom for differences. If the room is perfect, you can safely move forward. However, if you notice even the slightest difference, you must step back. Your primary weapon in this game is a keen eye and quick reaction time.

Immerse yourself in the school days atmosphere and test your spotting skills in “Is it different or not?” A variety of rooms filled with riddles and secrets await you. Complete all

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 200x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
